channel.title: Posts on chrmod.net
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on chrmod.net

item.title: hello world
item.description: Will try to go fast with this one as it’s my first blog post ever. Hello World! Guess that’s the phrase, that most developers use when they start a new project, right? Yet another dev blog Yes, chrmod.net is going to be yet another blog by some kind of developer. You can expect to find here code/configuration snippets, tips for my favorite tools, or solutions to tech problems that I found surprising.
